column1: '''Falls of Rauros''' is a black metal band formed in [[2005]] in the United States. The band describes their music as "North Appalachian Heathen Black Folk Metal
column2: exhibited by their firm beliefs in returning the world to a pre-Christian time, as well as their appreciation for nature. They have released two full-length albums, Into the Archaic" and "Hail Wind and Hewn Oak".
